data.title: Bonnie & Clyde: The Musical (Perpetual Access)
data.meta_description: Get your rental now! Buy now, stream forever!
data.text:
*ALL TICKETS ARE DIGITAL, YOU WILL NOT RECEIVE A PHYSICAL TICKET, YOUR ACCOUNT ATTRIBUTED TO YOUR TICKET PURCHASE (AD-FREE OR AD-SUPPORTED) WILL BE YOUR ENTRY TO VIEW THE VIDEO

Video Rental FAQs

I've purchased tickets to the rental. How do I access it?

Visit the rental pages based on the ticket type you purchased (Ad-Free or Ad-Supported):

Ad-Free Video

Ad-Supported Video

and log into the account you set up during your checkout process. If you didn't create an account, you can create your account here.

How can I create an account if I don't have one yet?

You can create your account HERE. Please use the same email that you used for placing your order. Also, make sure the email you use matches the one associated with your chosen payment method (Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal). All available payment methods are listed on the site.

I'm having trouble logging in. What should I do?

If you're experiencing issues logging in or resetting your password, you might need to create your account. If you didn't log in while purchasing your ticket, an account wouldn't have been automatically created.

Can I watch the rental video on my TV?

Yes, the rental can be viewed on your TV, but note that the casting will not start until the stream does. Here's how:

TV with web browser app: Open the browser app on your TV, navigate to the rental streaming page, sign in, and start watching.

Apple TV or Chromecast: Connect your device to the TV, open the rental page on a browser on your mobile device or computer, sign in, and start watching. For detailed instructions, refer to the Chromecast guide or the Apple TV guide.

What if I have more questions?
